segments.text: We can't complain about the weather recently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the sun shines day after day . It's neither too hot nor too cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder how long this weather can last .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope it will last fine Sorrow . I'm going to have a picnic with my family .
segments.speaker: S2
